title: The humble petition of divers inhabitants of the county of Hertford, who have faithfully adhered to the Good Old Cause. Presented to the Parliament, by Dr. Barber, with many free-holders, and other inhabitants of the said county, May 13. 1659. Together with the Parliament's answer thereunto.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Tho. Brewster, at the Three Bibles, near the West-End of Pauls,
